entry.title: ORIGINAL PFANNKUCHEN 🥞 Here’s how I like my Pfannkuchen!😎 RECIPE (1 serving -> 4 Pfannkuchen, 15min prep time): -70g flour -a pinch of sugar -a pinch of salt -100ml milk -40ml sparkling water (or more milk) Whisk until it’s a smooth batter. Add a ladlef

entry.title: KOHLRABI STEAKS 😋 Easy, delicious and you can also prepare them on a BBQ.😌 RECIPE (3 serve, 3in prep time): -2 kohlrabi Peel and cut in steaks and score them -2 Tbsp olive oil -1 Tsp maple syrup -1 Tsp soy sauce -1 Tsp paprika -salt and pepper to taste
entry.content: KOHLRABI STEAKS 😋 Easy, delicious and you can also prepare them on a BBQ.😌 RECIPE (3 serve, 3in prep time): -2 kohlrabi Peel and cut in steaks and score them -2 Tbsp olive oil -1 Tsp maple syrup -1 Tsp soy sauce -1 Tsp paprika -salt and pepper to taste

entry.title: LET’S TALK ABOUT SAUCES! 👩‍🍳 Sauces and condiments are one of the key components for making delicious food! So in the nexts days I’ll share with you my Top 5 sauces I like to prep and keep in the fridge to have them on hand whenever I need them.😎 - SPREC

entry.title: FAVORITE SAUCES NR. 2 😋 Greens pesto I love using leftover greens for pesto before they go bad and you can use all kinds: spinach, rocket or any herbs! I like to pair it with my orzo salad but you can use it just like pesto. 🤌 RECIPE (2-3 servings, 10min
